/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are predominantly white and gray, typical of urban architecture. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, adding another layer of depth to the image.
